title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Scaffolding Strategies for Improving Mathematics-Based Accounting Learning Outcomes

learning_goals: Improve financial analysis accuracy by over 30% by converting accounting data into mathematical modeling

Reduce individual learning gaps by over 50% based on formative assessment feedback
